ALMDG.PA.summary: MGI Digital Technology SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme designs, manufactures, and sells digital printing and finishing equipment for the graphic industry in France and internationally. The company offers digital printing and finishing equipment in the areas of inkjet technology, digital printing, spot uv coating, embossed hot foiling, adhesive labels, digital finishing, plastic card production, envelope solutions, and turnkey paper solutions. Its products include JETvarnish 3D Evolution, a spot UV coating solution; JETvarnish 3D Web and JETvarnish 3D Web Color+, a roll-to-roll finishing solution; JETvarnish 3D, a solution for 3D or traditional flat spot UV coating; JETVARNISH 3DS, a digital solution; Meteor Unlimited Colors Se+, a range of new digital print production systems; and Meteor Unlimited Colors XL+, a range of new digital print production systems. The company's products also comprise Meteor DP8700 Se+, a digital printing solution; Meteor DP8700 XL+, a digital press equipment; Meteor DP8700 XL+ DF Pro, a digital printing and inline finishing solution; and JETcard 3D that provides card manufacturers with a printing/encoding/finishing solution. In addition, its products consists of DF Pro Solo, a paper finishing solution; PressCard Pro, an industrial production unit dedicated to the short run lamination of plastic substrates; PunchCard Pro, a semi-automatic card punching unit; and EnvelopExpress Pro, an envelope feeder for the Meteor DP8700 XL/XL+. The company serves industries, including commercial printers, plastic card manufacturers, government agencies, packaging firms, in-plant printers, newspaper printers, photo printers/labs, and book printers. MGI Digital Technology SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Fresnes, France.

CTRG.PA.summary: Catering International & Services SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme and its subsidiaries provide catering, accommodation, and facilities management services for oil and gas, mining, construction, civil engineering, and armed forces sectors. The company offers sourcing and logistics services; and reception, accommodation management, laundry, cleaning and housekeeping, and concierge services. It also engages in cleaning; design, engineering, and construction; water treatment; shipchandling and procurement; fleet management; skilled personnel recruitment; personnel transport; recreational and leisure; waste management; landscaping; and pest control activities, as well as the provision of access control, maintenance, and fire safety services. In addition, the company offers SystemONE, a combined integrated digital solution that enhances the daily management of sites and well-being of residents. It has operations in Africa, the Middle-East, Commonwealth of Independent States, the Americas, Asia, and Oceania. Catering International & Services SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme was founded in 1992 is headquartered in Marseille, France.

ELIS.PA.summary: Elis SA provides linen and work wear rental, laundry, and hygiene and well-being services in France, the United Kingdom, Ireland, Central Europe, Scandinavia, Eastern Europe, Southern Europe, and Latin America. The company offers work uniforms for the hospitality, healthcare, ultra-clean, beauty, industry, agrifood, and other sectors; automatic clothing dispenser systems; and linens for hospitality and healthcare sectors. It also provides washroom hygiene services, such as hand washing and wiping, toilet paper dispensers, air purification, washroom hygiene, and feminine hygiene. In addition, the company offers infectious medical waste management services primarily for the healthcare sector; equipment for reception areas; floor protection services, such as mat rental and maintenance; beverage dispensers; and pest control services. It primarily serves the hospitality, industry, trade, and healthcare sectors. Elis SA was founded in 1883 and is headquartered in Saint-Cloud, France.

IDL.PA.summary: ID Logistics Group SA provides contract logistics services in France and internationally. The company offers warehousing and value-added, supply chain, turnkey project delivery, and e-commerce solutions. It also organizes transport flows. The company serves customers in the distribution, FMCG, e-commerce, high-tech, cosmetics, fashion, automotive, pharmaceuticals, and aerospace sectors. It serves customers in France, Spain, Portugal, Poland, Russia, China, Taiwan, Indonesia, Morocco, Indian Ocean, South Africa, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Germany, Belgium, the Netherlands, and Romania. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Orgon, France.

MAN.PA.summary: Manutan International S.A. operates as a multichannel distributor of equipment for companies and local authorities primarily in Europe. It offers a range of products, such as handling, lifting, and storage and transportation equipment; industrial supplies; safety, hygiene, and packing products; office and workshop furniture; furniture for catering and hotels; school supplies; education, health, and sports equipment; products for environmental protection; ironmongery items; and electrical products. The company markets its products through paper catalogues, online, and sales agencies and forces. It also provides various associated services, including assembly, spare parts, bespoke design, express delivery, and a loyalty programme, as well as e-procurement for key accounts, which include punch-out, on-demand sourcing, managing hosted stock, etc. The company also exports its products to Africa, Asia, and the Middle East. Manutan International S.A. was founded in 1966 and is based in Gonesse, France.

MLCMI.PA.long_name: Societe De Conseil En Externalisation Et En Marketing Internet Société Anonyme
MLCMI.PA.summary: Societe De Conseil En Externalisation Et En Marketing Internet SociÃ©tÃ© Anonyme provides data entry and processing services. It also offers data entry and processing , multichannel customer relations, business process outsourcing, marketing content management, and opinion data analysis services. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Boulogne Billancourt, France.

MLGAI.PA.summary: Grande Armee Investissement SA provides practical training services in the areas of finance, technologies, and healthcare for managers of private and public companies. The company also offers conference services for professional fairs, as well as edition and publishing, and consulting services. It operates in France, Belgium, Luxembourg, Spain, Portugal, and Switzerland. The company was formerly known as EFE Edition Formation Entreprise. Grande Armee Investissement SA was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Paris, France.

MLOEX.PA.summary: One Experience SA engages in event communication activities. It organizes events, including seminars, conferences, management committees, training, start-up pitch, RP evenings, team-building events, shootings, etc. The company is based in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.

MLPHW.PA.summary: Phone Web SA provides remote client relationship management and telesales of products. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Paris, France.

SDXAY.summary: Sodexo S.A. develops, manages, and delivers on-site, benefits and rewards, and personal and home services worldwide. It provides various on-site services, including business and administration, which covers corporate, energy and resources, government and agencies, sports and leisure, and other customers; healthcare and seniors; and education services comprising schools and universities. The company also provides food services; benefits and rewards services, such as employee benefits, incentive and recognition programs, employee mobility, expense management, and public benefits; and personal and home services, including childcare, concierge, and in-home care services. In addition, it offers facility management services, including cleaning, front of house, security, ground maintenance, mailroom, document management, waste management, laundry, transportation, general repairs, technical maintenance, asset management, energy management, and project management services. The company was formerly known as Sodexho Alliance and changed its name to Sodexo S.A. in 2008. Sodexo S.A. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Issy-les-Moulineaux, France.
